name: Starship Factory
description:
Starship Factory

A Factorio style starship construction game. Design your own version of Starbase and construct your own test tanks and starships. This is a WIP demo and not representative of the final gameplay or graphics. 

Controls General
  • Escape - Quit game
Camera
  • WASD - Camera movement
  • Mouse & Hold Right Click - Rotate camera
  • Hold Shift - Increase camera movement speed
Construction
  • Left Mouse - Select buildings
  • Right Mouse - Cancel while building
  • R - Rotate building
